words_with_descriptions.suburb: An outlying district of a city, especially a residential one.
words_with_descriptions.loft: An upper room or floor in a building, typically in a commercial or industrial district, often converted into a living space.
words_with_descriptions.mall: A large indoor shopping complex with various stores and eateries.
words_with_descriptions.taxi: A car available for hire with a driver, used for transporting passengers.
words_with_descriptions.grid: A network of lines that cross each other to form a series of squares or rectangles, often used to describe city streets.
words_with_descriptions.highrise: A building with many stories, typically found in densely populated urban areas, used for residential or office purposes.
words_with_descriptions.gate: A point of entry or exit in a fence or wall, often leading to a building or enclosed area.
words_with_descriptions.shop: A small retail establishment selling items to the public.
words_with_descriptions.flat: A set of rooms forming an individual residence, typically on one floor and within a larger building.
